name: LNP™ VERTON™ Compound PX06419
description: LNP™ VERTON™ Compound PX06419 combines Polyamide 6 (Nylon 6) resin with 50% long glass fiber and proprietary fillers, emphasizing heat stabilization and structural strength. Tailored for demanding applications in automotive exteriors, building components, and across various industrial sectors, this compound excels in providing high stiffness and strength without intentional PFAS additives. With its optimized formulation including both glass fiber and proprietary fillers,LNP™ VERTON™ Compound PX06419 ensures robust performance during injection molding processes. It is ideal for sport and leisure equipment, home appliances, and commercial appliances, delivering reliability and endurance where durability and performance are paramount.
